user.title: Set up Power Saver
user.description: Configure a power saver instance for an appliance. You can add multiple instances for different appliances.

data_description.name: A descriptive name for this instance (e.g., 'Water Heater', 'Floor Heating').
data_description.nordpool_sensor: The Nordpool sensor that provides hourly electricity prices.
data_description.min_hours: Minimum number of hours to keep active per day. The cheapest hours are selected.
data_description.always_cheap_price: Price below which the slot is always activated, regardless of other settings. Set to 0 to disable.
data_description.always_expensive_price: Price at or above which the slot is never activated (safety cutoff). Set to 0 to disable.
data_description.rolling_window_hours: Ensures minimum active hours within any rolling window of this size. Set to 0 to disable (uses pure daily price optimization).
data_description.controlled_entities: Entities to turn on/off when state changes. Leave empty to control via your own automations.

error.invalid_nordpool_sensor: The selected sensor does not appear to be a Nordpool sensor (missing raw_today attribute).
error.invalid_rolling_window: When rolling window is enabled, minimum active hours must be greater than 0.
error.already_configured: A power saver with this name and sensor is already configured.

abort.already_configured: This power saver instance is already configured.

init.title: Power Saver Options
init.description: Adjust scheduling parameters. Changes take effect immediately.

data_description.min_hours: Minimum number of hours to keep active per day (or per rolling window).
data_description.always_cheap_price: Price below which slots are always activated. 0 = disabled.
data_description.always_expensive_price: Price at or above which slots are never activated. 0 = disabled.
data_description.rolling_window_hours: Rolling window constraint in hours. 0 = disabled.
data_description.controlled_entities: Entities to turn on/off when state changes. Leave empty to control via your own automations.
